name: SpaceF(rost)
description: Unity game about an Ice World in floating space, where the player has to use the fire of his jetpack to melt icy blocks that block the passage in the icy cave, where the challenges are Dual Action and Unnatural Mastery. The player with their jetpack can decide the direction they want to go and can advance through the Ice Cave, with the camera focus moving forward as the game progresses, and the player must manage to stay within the focus space from the game camera, which makes it fast, fun and challenging.
